quote1: Never tell people how to do things. Tell them what to do and they will surprise you with their ingenuity.

quote2: If everyone is thinking alike, then somebody isn't thinking.

quote3: A good plan violently executed right now is far better than a perfect plan executed next week.

quote4: Accept the challenges, so that you may feel the exhilaration of victory.

quote5: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.

quote6: A pint of sweat will save a gallon of blood.

quote7: It is foolish and wrong to mourn the men who died. Rather we should thank God that such men lived.

quote8: Wars may be fought with weapons, but they are won by men. It is the spirit of the men who follow and of the man who leads that gains the victory.

quote9: Courage is fear holding on a minute longer.

May God have mercy upon my enemies, because I wonâ€™t.
